mapper.select: SELECT dict_item_code dictItemCode, dict_code dictCode, dict_item_name dictItemName, dict_name dictName, remark remark FROM dictionary

SELECT dict_item_code dictItemCode, dict_code dictCode, dict_item_name dictItemName, dict_name dictName, remark remark FROM dictionary WHERE dict_item_code = #{ dictItemCode } AND dict_code = #{ dictCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary ( dict_item_code, dict_code, dict_item_name, dict_name, remark ) VALUES ( #{ dictItemCode }, #{ dictCode }, #{ dictItemName }, #{ dictName }, #{ remark } )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dictionary WHERE dict_item_code = #{ dictItemCode } AND dict_code = #{ dictCode }
